trigger_prototype.name: Volume {#SNMPVALUE} - FreeSpace is less than 10% on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: ({Template SNMP ReadyNas 3200:sys1_fan_RPM.last()}<2000) or ({Template SNMP ReadyNas 3200:sys2_fan_RPM.last()}<2000) or ({Template SNMP ReadyNas 3200:sys3_fan_RPM.last()}<2000) or ({Template SNMP ReadyNas 3200:cpu_fan_RPM.last()}<2000)
trigger.name: Fan is too slow on {HOST.NAME}
